code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  maximumProcessableQueries ( vector < int >&  nums ,  vector < int >&  queries )  {   const  int  n  =  nums . size ();   int  ans  =  0 ;       vector < vector < int >>  dp ( n ,  vector < int > ( n ));   for  ( int  d  =  n  -  1 ;  d  >=  0 ;  -- d )  {   for  ( int  i  =  0 ;  i  <  n ;  ++ i )  {   const  int  j  =  i  +  d ;   if  ( j  >=  n )   continue ;   if  ( i  >  0 )     dp [ i ][ j ]  =  max ( dp [ i ][ j ],   dp [ i  -  1 ][ j ]  +  ( nums [ i  -  1 ]  >=  queries [ dp [ i  -  1 ][ j ]]));   if  ( j  +  1  <  n )     dp [ i ][ j ]  =  max ( dp [ i ][ j ],   dp [ i ][ j  +  1 ]  +  ( nums [ j  +  1 ]  >=  queries [ dp [ i ][ j  +  1 ]]));   if  ( dp [ i ][ j ]  ==  queries . size ())   return  queries . size ();   }   }   for  ( int  i  =  0 ;  i  <  n ;  ++ i )   ans  =  max ( ans ,  dp [ i ][ i ]  +  ( nums [ i ]  >=  queries [ dp [ i ][ i ]]));   return  ans ;   }  };
